articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo signs for Manchester United, returning to Old Trafford in shock move from Juventus - ABC News
articles.description: The latest twist in football's European transfer window sees superstar Cristiano Ronaldo return to Manchester United, a day after telling Serie A side Juventus he no longer wanted to play for them.
articles.content:
Cristiano Ronaldo is heading back to Manchester United, the team that turned him into a global superstar.
